name: Welcome Home (KP)
description:
Welcome Home is a game about moving into a new home. You haven’t brought anything with you, but a wholesome floating blob was kind enough to help you design the home of your dreams using nothing but your imagination.

For maximum swag y’all should post your houses in the comments :-}

Controls

Use your mouse to draw furniture, and X to advance dialog.

Supported Platforms

Right now the game only supports Windows, but I intend to port it soon.

Made by @KP_CFTSZ
